name: ServiceNow A2A Client
description: Official ServiceNow A2A client for invoking ServiceNow AI agents via the A2A protocol. Includes OAuth authentication, ITSM incident categorization, and enterprise service management workflows.

skills.name: Incident Categorization
skills.description: Categorize ITSM incidents using ServiceNow AI agents via A2A protocol.

skills.name: Service Management
skills.description: Manage enterprise service workflows through ServiceNow AI agents.
